description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs 

NETWORKNET-34112 - ICS added to PST raises error "Recurrance pattern not valid" when viewed in outlook
NETWORKNET-34131 - MapiContactEventPropertySet information lost from MapiContact
NETWORKNET-34134 - EML to MemoryStream causes NullReferenceException
NETWORKNET-34135 - Message saved from ANSI PST has no body
NETWORKNET-34144 - Exception is raised while MSG file converted to TIFF
NETWORKNET-34145 - EML/MSG to XPS raises InvalidOperationException
NETWORKNET-34146 - Base64 encoded attachment can't be opened when saved using Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-34147 - MhtMessageFormatter not taking TimezoneOffset into account
NETWORKNET-34149 - InvalidCastException while copying messages from PST to PST
NETWORKNET-34151 - Connecting using SmtpClient gives authentication-failed-due-to-lack-of-credentials error
NETWORKNET-34154 - Recieved meeting body embeds extra "\"
NETWORKNET-34155 - "Unknown value has been detected" exception while connecting to ImapServer
NETWORKNET-34156 - MSG to MHTML: Inline images missing in output
NETWORKNET-34162 - EML to MSG raises System.UriFormatException
NETWORKNET-34159 - Remove License Order Id: xxx from listed
New Features

NETWORKNET-33388 - Implement search of messages or folders in the PST file on certain criteria
NETWORKNET-33402 - Implement ability to add Color Category to message
NETWORKNET-33770 - Ability to add reminder to created Appointments
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
